conclusion: Preliminary objections dismissed (victim, non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Remainder inadmissible;Violation of Art. 11;Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - awards
docname: CASE OF HYDE PARK AND OTHERS v. MOLDOVA (Nos. 5 and 6)
issue: Articles 32 and 40 of the Constitution ; Sections 6-8, 11-15 and 19 of the Assemblies Act ; Articles 166 and 184 of the Criminal Code ; Article 174 of the Code of Administrative Offences ; Article 14 of the Civil Code ; Law no. 1545 (1998) on compensation for damage caused by the illegal acts of the criminal investigation organs, prosecution and courts
judges: David Thór Björgvinsson;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Mihai Poalelungi;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
